title: Envision secures 116 MW wind turbine supply order from Blueleaf Energy
description: Envision Wind Power Technologies India secured a 116-MW wind turbine supply deal with Blueleaf Energy. Construction on the co-located wind-solar hybrid project in Madhya Pradesh will start in 2024 and finish in 2025. Components will be locally sourced, supporting the Atmanirbhar Bharat vision. Envision has created over 2,000 job opportunities in India.
